text: ovunaṭa pasu va pæmiṇiyavun ‘apagē paramādhipatiyāṇeni! apa hā dēva viśvāsayen apaṭa pera ikut va giya apagē sahōdarayinṭa samāva denu mænava! viśvāsa kaḷavun piḷiban̆da va dvēṣayak apagē sit tuḷa æti nokaranu mænava! apagē paramādhipatiyāṇeni! niyata vaśayenma num̆ba senehevantaya mahā kāruṇānvitaya yæyi pavasati
